full_story: One bright morning in Bedrock, Wilma and Betty were bubbling with excitement as they opened a shiny envelope. “Look, Fred! We got tickets to the Grand Bedrock Gala!” cheered Wilma, her eyes sparkling. “Oh boy!” Fred exclaimed, jumping up with a loud thud, “We need to look our best!” But Wilma chuckled softly, “Fred, you need a bit of charm first!” So, Fred and his goofy best friend Barney decided to go to charm school. “We’ll learn to be fancy!” Barney said, grinning from ear to ear. At the school, they met a stern teacher who said, “Remember, boys, manners are important!” Fred tried to sit up straight but accidentally knocked over a chair! “Oops!” he laughed, while Barney giggled and said, “At least we’re having fun!” They practiced saying "please" and "thank you," but Fred kept forgetting! Meanwhile, Pebbles and Dino, their playful pet dinosaur, peeked through the window, giggling at their silly dads. “Look, Mommy! Daddy is being funny!” squealed Pebbles. After a fun day of learning, Fred and Barney finally felt ready. “We can do this!” Fred said, beaming with confidence. When the big night came, Fred and Barney wore their best clothes and tried their hardest to be charming. “Good evening, ladies!” they said, with wide smiles. Wilma and Betty were proud of their husbands, and everyone at the gala laughed and danced together. At the end of the night, Fred hugged Wilma and said, “I might not be perfect, but I’m perfect for you!” And with that, they all agreed that the best charm of all was simply being themselves.

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive. Barney. Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style. Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.A festive gala scene filled with joy and laughter where Wilma and Betty proudly watch their husbands Barney and Fred as everyone dances and enjoys the enchanting atmosphere of the night. Elegant decorations such as twinkling fairy lights colorful banners and a sparkling dance floor along with a table laden with delicious food and drinks creating a celebratory ambiance. Wilma is positioned on the left side of the foreground slightly turned towards Betty creating a sense of camaraderie. Betty is standing next to Wilma slightly behind her contributing to the feeling of friendship. Barney is in the center of the dance floor showcasing his dance moves drawing attention. Fred is nearby Barney slightly to the right engaging with the crowd and adding to the lively atmosphere.    } The background features a beautifully decorated gala hall with colorful lights a dance floor filled with couples dancing and guests mingling all under a sparkling ceiling that enhances the magical feel of the night. Wide shot capturing the entire scene of the gala including the dancing couples the decorations and the joyful expressions of all the characters involved.

captions_info.caption: At the end of the night, Fred hugged Wilma and said, "I might not be perfect, but I’m perfect for you!"
captions_info.description: Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme. Wilma. Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.A warm and intimate nighttime scene where Fred and Wilma share a heartfelt moment emphasizing their love and connection at the end of a long day. A cozy softly lit home environment possibly with a glowing lamp or fireplace in the background creating a comforting atmosphere. Fred and Wilma are the focal point with Freds arms wrapped around Wilma in a loving embrace. Fred is leaning slightly forward wrapping his arms around Wilma in a gentle hug while Wilma is leaning into him enjoying the warmth of his embrace. Fred is looking down at Wilma with affection as he speaks. Freds face shows a mix of sincerity and warmth with a gentle smile that conveys his love and reassurance. Wilmas expression is one of contentment and happiness with a soft smile that reflects her appreciation for Freds words. Fred is positioned slightly to the left in the foreground with Wilma nestled against him on the right side both figures close together to emphasize their bond. The background features a cozy living room setting with soft lighting perhaps a few family photos on the walls and a comfortable couch or armchair creating a sense of home and intimacy. Medium shot capturing Fred and Wilma from the waist up allowing for a clear view of their expressions and the warmth of their embrace while also hinting at the cozy setting around them.
